]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function evaluateProperty({
    api,
    helpers
}) {
    var numberLabel = helpers.translateSync("Number");
    var shortDescLabel = helpers.translateSync("Short Description");
    var descLabel = helpers.translateSync("Description");
    var closeNoteLabel = helpers.translateSync("Resolution Notes");
    return {
        "columns": [{
            "headerTextDisabled": true,
            "key": "number",
            "label": numberLabel,
            "metadata": {
                "excludedOperators": [],
                "internalType": "string",
                "isChoice": false,
                "isDescending": false,
                "isFilterable": true,
                "isFiltered": false,
                "isGroupable": true,
                "isSortable": true,
                "isSorted": true,
                "referenceDisplayName": null
            },
            "type": "link"
        }, {
            "headerTextDisabled": true,
            "key": "short_description",
            "label": shortDescLabel,
            "metadata": {
                "excludedOperators": [],

                "isChoice": false,
                "isFilterable": true,
                "isFiltered": false,
                "isGroupable": true,
                "isSortable": true,
                "referenceDisplayName": null
            },
            "type": "string"
        }, {
            "headerTextDisabled": true,
            "key": "description",
            "label": descLabel,
            "metadata": {
                "excludedOperators": [],
                "internalType": "string",
                "isChoice": false,
                "isFilterable": true,
                "isFiltered": false,
                "isGroupable": false,
                "isSortable": true,
                "referenceDisplayName": null
            },
            "type": "string"
        }, {
            "headerTextDisabled": true,
            "key": "close_notes",
            "label": closeNoteLabel,
            "metadata": {
                "excludedOperators": [],

                "isFiltered": false,
                "isGroupable": false,
                "isSortable": false,

        }]
    };
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-11-27 03:53:32</sys_created_on><sys_id>1d487c3ac342d21044643eec0501316d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>presentational_list_main/columnDefinitions</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ePOs" source="x_1097202_epos">cee28b2783e01210aaa27e95eeaad3ff</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ePOs">cee28b2783e01210aaa27e95eeaad3ff</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_1d487c3ac342d21044643eec0501316d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-11-27 03:53:32</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
